mapper.select: INSERT INTO forecast_tmp(id, DATE, high, fengli, low, fengxiang, TYPE, cid, day_order) values(null, #{date}, #{high}, #{fengli}, #{low}, #{fengxiang}, #{type}, #{cid}, #{day_order});
mapper.update: UPDATE forecast, forecast_tmp SET forecast.date = CASE WHEN forecast.date <> forecast_tmp.date THEN forecast_tmp.date ELSE forecast.date END, forecast.fengli = CASE WHEN forecast.fengli <> forecast_tmp.fengli THEN forecast_tmp.fengli ELSE forecast.fengli END, forecast.fengxiang = CASE WHEN forecast.fengxiang <> forecast_tmp.fengxiang THEN forecast_tmp.fengxiang ELSE forecast.fengxiang END, forecast.high = CASE WHEN forecast.high <> forecast_tmp.high THEN forecast_tmp.high ELSE forecast.high END, forecast.low = CASE WHEN forecast.low <> forecast_tmp.low THEN forecast_tmp.low ELSE forecast.low END, forecast.type = CASE WHEN forecast.type <> forecast_tmp.type THEN forecast_tmp.type ELSE forecast.type END WHERE forecast.cid = forecast_tmp.cid AND forecast.day_order = forecast_tmp.day_order
